author: dion
msg: - Added ProjectDescriptor and Repository for build process
- Reworked project class and removed file dependencies to descriptor class
- fixed formatting on simple docbook stylesheet

author: glennm
msg: - You can once again have a docs only project that uses maven:site.  The
targets that were supposed to be checking if source and unit test files are
present weren't.  Some of the delegated targets later in the process were,
but not all.  So, I put the if's right at the "top level" targets to avoid

author: vmassol
msg: VTL variables must not have any "." in their names. Replaced any "." found in maven ant properties by "-"

author: dion
msg: Change getProject methods to call constructors
